name: RIDE YOUR MIND
storyline: RYM uses knowledge and devices from the medical world to create an artistic and experimental form of entertainment. The NeuroVR Game RYM is generated by neurofeedback collected by an EmotivEEG Brain Computer Interface (BCI). The game environment gets responsively designed by the actual neuronal data. An Oculus Rift Head-Mounted Display (HMD) displayes the playable visualisation of the users brain. The data will be processed using Unity3D and a specially developed Neurogame Design Toolchain for Unity3D.
summary: Ride Your Mind is a BCI-VR-Game / NeuroVR Game that forces the user's conscious to compete with his subconscious. The aim of RYM is to imbue the player with an awareness of his own brain as a consciously controllable tool comparable, for example, to his hand.
